headliners.name: Hozier
headliners.note: Irish sensation behind global anthem 'Take Me to Church' and 2024's 'Unreal Unearth' tour

headliners.name: Luke Combs
headliners.note: Country superstar whose debut album spent 50 weeks at #1 on Billboard

artists.name: Asleep at the Wheel
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - Texas legends keeping Western swing alive for 50+ years

artists.name: Dylan Gossett
artists.note: Rising country star whose 'Coal' went viral on TikTok in 2024

artists.name: Maren Morris
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - Country crossover star behind 'The Middle' with Zedd

headliners.name: The Strokes
headliners.note: Garage rock pioneers whose 'Is This It' defined early 2000s indie music

headliners.name: Sabrina Carpenter
headliners.note: Pop sensation who evolved from Disney star to chart-topper with 'Short n' Sweet' album

artists.name: S.L. Houser
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - Austin local multi-instrumentalist and singer-songwriter

artists.name: INOHA
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - San Antonio surf punk band making waves in Texas

artists.name: Modest Mouse
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - Indie rock veterans celebrating 30+ years with 'Float On'

artists.name: The Backseat Lovers
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - Utah indie rockers behind viral hit 'Kilby Girl'

artists.name: LP Giobbi
artists.note: Piano house pioneer and founder of Femme House movement

artists.name: Doechii
artists.note: Rising rap star who went viral with 'Yucky Blucky Fruitcake' in 2024

artists.name: Sammy Virji
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - UK garage and bass music producer taking over dance floors

headliners.name: The Killers
headliners.note: ‚≠ê Replaced Doja Cat as headliner - Las Vegas rock legends behind 'Mr. Brightside'

headliners.name: John Summit
headliners.note: Chicago house music star whose 'Deep End' became a pandemic dance anthem

artists.name: Geto Gala
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - Austin duo bringing high-energy Latin-influenced performances

artists.name: CA7RIEL & Paco Amoroso
artists.note: Argentine duo blending jazz, EDM, trap, and Latin pop in innovative ways

artists.name: The Dare
artists.note: Leading the indie sleaze revival movement with danceable electronic rock

artists.name: Wet Leg
artists.note: British duo who became overnight sensations with viral hit 'Chaise Longue'

artists.name: T-Pain
artists.note: Auto-Tune pioneer bringing millennial nostalgia with hits like 'Buy U a Drank'

artists.name: Phantogram
artists.note: Weekend 1 Exclusive - Electronic rock duo blending dreamy vocals with hip-hop beats
